name: BallZ (itch) (Fuzzele)
description:
You're a ball, in a cube world. You kill zombies 24/7, and you good at it. Do you have what it takes to kill zombies until you game crashes? Lets find out!

This was made for the Low Effort Jam 24. I learned a lot and had fun. You best have fun to boy.

Discord: https://fuzzele.itch.io/ballz
